input.system_prompt:
You are an AI assistant evaluating product relevancy.
Your goal is to determine how relevant a list of competitor products are to a specific reference product, based on names and descriptions.
Output the scores as a JSON object containing a single key 'scores', which is an array of objects. Each object in the array must have 'competitor_product_name' (the exact competitor product name provided in the input), 'relevancy_score' (an integer 1-10), and 'rationale' (a brief explanation for the score).

The relevancy scale is 1-10:
- 1: Not relevant at all.
- 10: Identical product.

Important scoring guidelines:
- Focus on product function, features, silhouette, and construction
- DO NOT emphasize color or pattern when scoring, as the reference product may encompass a wide range of colors/patterns not specified
- Consider the core product type, shape, materials, and intended use
- Evaluate if the products serve similar purposes and would appeal to similar customers
- Ensure every competitor product listed receives a score.
input.user_prompt:
Reference Brand: "National Tree"
Reference Product Name: "Unlit Dunhill Fir Tree"
Reference Product Description:
The Dunhill Fir is a full body tree featuring a generous number of branch tips for holding holiday trimmings. It is pre-strung with 650 clear lights that remain lit even if a bulb burns out. This tree features hinged branch construction for ease of assembly. Sturdy folding metal tree stand is included.

This Dunhill Fir Full Artificial Green Christmas Tree is 6 feet tall with a 46 inch base diameter. Featuring hundreds of individually crafted branch tips to create full bodied branches, this tree is designed to look and feel lifelike.
Designed to look and feel lifelike, this tree is defined by its close attention to detail, featuring hundreds of individually crafted branch tips that make up the wide, full-bodied branches that create space for your lights and ornaments.
This tree features pre-attached, hinged branches that drop down for a simple set-up and fold back in for quick and convenient storage. Properly shape the tree by peeling back the branches and pulling the tips apart.
Constructed with sturdy, high quality materials, hypo-allergenic, fire-resistant needles, this tree is built to bring holiday cheer for years to come. Includes a durable metal base.
At National Tree Company, we believe that special holiday memories donâ€™t have to be far and few between. This Christmas season, let our decorations transform your home while you focus on creating more of those magical moments.

Competitor Products to Evaluate (Max 25):
  - Name='Balsam Hill Denali White Christmas Tree Most Realistic Green Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Christmas Time CT-NP065-NL 6.5 ft. Norway Pine Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='National Tree Company Dunhill Fir Tree'
  - Name='7.5 ft Pre-Lit Slim Elegant Series Fraser Fir Artificial Christmas Tree with 600 UL-Listed Clear'
  - Name='National Tree Company Majestic Fir Tree'
  - Name='National Tree Company First Traditions Acacia Flocked Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='2 ft. Pre-Lit Artificial Christmas Tree with Decorative Pinecones and Burlap Base'
  - Name='Ebern Designs 7' Tall Unlit Slim Douglas Fir Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Make Market Mini Evergreen Trees'
  - Name='Creative Co-Op Hello Honey 5" Paper Tree with Floral Pattern'
  - Name='Vickerman 7.5' Cactus Pine Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='National Tree Company Lit White Winchester Pine Christmas Tree'
  - Name='National Tree Company Winchester White Pine Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Puleo International 9 ft. Pre-Lit Balsam Fir Artificial Christmas Tree with 1000 UL-Listed'
  - Name='Best Choice Products Pre-Decorated Holiday Christmas Tree for Home'
  - Name='The Holiday Aisle Dunhill Blue Fir Tree with Clear Lights'
  - Name='The Holiday Aisle Green Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='The Holiday Aisle White Pine Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Tall Unlit Slim Fir Artificial Christmas Tree With Realistic Branches And 865 Tips The Holiday Aisle'
  - Name='The Holiday Aisle Pencil Unlit Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='The Twillery Co. Peabody Fir Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='National Tree Company 7' White Iridescent Tinsel Tree'
  - Name='National Tree Company Natural Fraser Slim Fir Tree'
  - Name='Fraser Hill Farm 10-Ft. Foxtail Pine Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Northlight Real Touch  Full Hudson Fir Artificial Christmas Tree'

Based on the reference product description and each competitor product's name, please provide the relevancy score for *each* competitor product using the 1-10 scale. Remember to focus on product features, silhouette, and construction rather than color or pattern. Return the results in the specified JSON format (an object with a 'scores' array, where each item has 'competitor_product_name', 'relevancy_score', and 'rationale' explaining why you assigned that score).

scores.description: An array of relevancy scores for the competitor products.

competitor_product_name.description: The exact name of the competitor product as provided in the input.

rationale.description: Brief explanation for why this score was assigned.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Balsam Hill Denali White Christmas Tree Most Realistic Green Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Similar full artificial Christmas tree designed to look realistic; likely comparable in fullness and purpose but a different brand and possibly different species focuses (Denali vs Dunhill Fir).

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Christmas Time CT-NP065-NL 6.5 ft. Norway Pine Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Similar height and artificial Christmas tree type with realistic focus but a different pine species and slightly taller, possibly less full bodied branch construction.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company Dunhill Fir Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Identical product by name and brand, matching exactly the reference product's species and likely features.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: 7.5 ft Pre-Lit Slim Elegant Series Fraser Fir Artificial Christmas Tree with 600 UL-Listed Clear
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Similar pre-lit artificial fir Christmas tree but slimmer silhouette and different fir species; different height.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company Majestic Fir Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same brand and fir tree type, likely shares similar features but 'Majestic' suggests possible variation in fullness or style; close relevance.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company First Traditions Acacia Flocked Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same brand but different species (Acacia) and flocked (different appearance and texture), which reduces relevancy to the Dunhill Fir.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: 2 ft. Pre-Lit Artificial Christmas Tree with Decorative Pinecones and Burlap Base
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Much smaller size and more of a decorative tabletop tree, fundamentally different use and scale.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Ebern Designs 7' Tall Unlit Slim Douglas Fir Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Similar species (fir), similar height but slimmer profile and unlit, so somewhat less relevant.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Make Market Mini Evergreen Trees
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Miniature decorative trees, very different product scale and purpose.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Creative Co-Op Hello Honey 5" Paper Tree with Floral Pattern
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Decorative paper item, not a realistic artificial Christmas tree.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Vickerman 7.5' Cactus Pine Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Different species (cactus pine not a common fir/pine type), likely different appearance and silhouette.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company Lit White Winchester Pine Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same brand with lit white pine species; similar usage but different pine species and light color may differ.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company Winchester White Pine Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same as above but unlit version; similar species but different from Dunhill fir.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Puleo International 9 ft. Pre-Lit Balsam Fir Artificial Christmas Tree with 1000 UL-Listed
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Similar fir species, much taller but full-bodied pre-lit tree, similar high quality features in construction.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Best Choice Products Pre-Decorated Holiday Christmas Tree for Home
scores_with_rationales.rationale: General pre-decorated tree; depends on species and construction but likely less focus on realistic branch tips than reference.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: The Holiday Aisle Dunhill Blue Fir Tree with Clear Lights
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same species and likely silhouette as the Dunhill Fir; blue vs green coloration but feature-wise very close and similarly lit.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: The Holiday Aisle Green Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Generic green artificial tree, no species or construction details; less relevant without further specifics.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: The Holiday Aisle White Pine Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Different pine species but similar artificial Christmas tree product type and brand.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Tall Unlit Slim Fir Artificial Christmas Tree With Realistic Branches And 865 Tips The Holiday Aisle
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Similar fir species and branch detail but slimmer profile and unlit, reducing direct similarity.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: The Holiday Aisle Pencil Unlit Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Slim pencil tree shape different from full Dunhill Fir silhouette.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: The Twillery Co. Peabody Fir Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Similar fir tree type and artificial Christmas tree function; likely similar fullness though brand differs.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company 7' White Iridescent Tinsel Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Tinsel tree is more decorative and less realistic than Dunhill Fir; different texture and construction.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company Natural Fraser Slim Fir Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same brand and fir type but slim profile reduces similarity somewhat.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Fraser Hill Farm 10-Ft. Foxtail Pine Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Larger tree and different species (foxtail pine) with less known about branch fullness and construction.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Northlight Real Touch  Full Hudson Fir Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Full artificial fir tree with realistic touch and similar species type; close in fullness and design intent.
